my parents are in there 80 s.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just trying to adjust to Swedish life.
Oh, that's exciting! How do you like it so far?
I'm really enjoying it! The people are so friendly and the food is amazing.
That's great to hear! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, watch Star Wars, and learn about personal finance and investing.
Oh, that's cool! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings series.
Me too! Those are both amazing series.
I know, right? They're so good.
What are some of your favorite things to do in your free time?
I love to play with my cello and I also enjoy watching movies.
That's cool! I love to play the piano.
Oh, that's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
It's not too hard to learn! I'm sure you could do it if you wanted to.
Maybe I'll look into taking some lessons.
That would be great! I'm sure you'd enjoy it.
Thanks for the suggestion! I appreciate it.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.
Me too
